title: Josphat Koli Nanok
subtitle:
Participated in session on Getting Burden and Responsibility Sharing Right for the Global Compact on Refugees at the first #RefugeeForum.
Happy that the Kalobeyei Integrated Socio-Economic Development Programme #KISEDP can be used as a successful global model on refugee support pic.twitter.com/JOzhwhk1Oc

title: Alexander Betts
subtitle: Refugees should be seen as providers of protection and assistance. Our forthcoming book @CUPAcademic #RefugeeForumpic.twitter.com/lGZdjZbAmL

title: Care4Calais
subtitle: Please sign this petition to ask the French authorities to open winter shelters for refugees living outside in Calais http://chng.it/Hdht5C2C  #MigrantsDay #IMD2019 #InternationalMigrantsDaypic.twitter.com/gbotDOaA8d

title: WHO/Europe
subtitle: Mental health issues can affect #refugees and #migrants – in their country of origin, during transit or while living in the host country. #HealthForAllpic.twitter.com/wG8a0xoZ0a

title: AU Youth Envoy
subtitle:
and met with Rwandese, Congolese, Somali & South Sudanese refugee youth in Uganda who are demanding #SilecningTheGuns and learnt from the them the challenges of refugees and their needs for protection, education and livelihoods.

#DGTrendspic.twitter.com/8ODbOO0RHL

title: Meritxell Relano
subtitle:
An important discussion at the #RefugeeForum this morning on how investments in water & sanitation must serve the immediate needs of refugees & the long-term needs of communities and countries.
@UNICEFWaterpic.twitter.com/1Y0OOBsXHu

title: Ireland UN Geneva
subtitle: Great meeting with @IOMchief this morning at #RefugeeForum to discuss cooperation between Ireland and @IOM - essential partner in implementing Global Compacts on Refugees and Migration. Look forward to welcoming you to Ireland in 2020. pic.twitter.com/1cyQf0WYct

title: Ravinder Barn
subtitle: In Sicily to deliver a keynote at an EU women refugees and violence conference; hope to catch this important exhibition on women trafficking and organised crime between Nigeria and Italy. #SexTrafficking #VAWpic.twitter.com/PqFV7SjrPK

title: Cameron Calder
subtitle: Kent refugee network spokesperson on Sky news. If ever a woman looked like a handwringer. pic.twitter.com/gctPqk85Ef

title: Stephen Brown
subtitle: Great to see the train of solidarity with refugees on the platform in Geneva #RefugeesForumpic.twitter.com/mWEGUk9HYc

title: GermanForeignOffice
subtitle: "Only 20% of the states participate in taking care of over 70 Mio. refugees. The message of the #RefugeeForum must therefore be: more solidarity in dealing with refugees, more international cooperation, more multilateralism." Foreign Minister @HeikoMaas in Geneva.pic.twitter.com/loXiwSF01K

title: UN Geneva
subtitle: “Burden sharing does not simply mean rich countries giving money to less developed countries to keep the refugees.” #RefugeeForumpic.twitter.com/G1cjgS05Q9

title: Shashank Joshi
subtitle: Amid all the arguments, @AmyKazmin succinctly spells out the core problem with India's citizenship bill: it is "the first time India has incorporated religious criteria into its naturalisation or refugee policies." https://www.ft.com/content/b9767a42-1cfb-11ea-97df-cc63de1d73f4 …"pic.twitter.com/CTcvJrn2Rv

title: AFP news agency
subtitle: #BREAKING Lack of aid for refugees forced Turkey into Syria operation: Erdogan pic.twitter.com/DMHP1iZmBz

title: Davide Vignati
subtitle: The 1st Global Refugee Forum co-hosted by #UNHCR and Switzerland comes at the end of a tumultuous decade in which the number of refugees has risen to over 25mio people worldwide. The #RefugeeForum is an opportunity to translate the principle of responsibility-sharing into actionpic.twitter.com/b7LFr3WOkW

title: IOM Indonesia
subtitle:
Migrants and refugees can spark new color and dynamics in any community.  IOM and local leaders in Semarang paved the way for refugees to become involved in communities activities,
#WeTogetherpic.twitter.com/oqhtUI3zpu

title: Nasir Andisha
subtitle: The #GlobalRefugeeForum begin with cohosts introduction.UNSG @antonioguterres has a poignant msg:Generosity is not correlated to wealth of nations when it comes to supporting refugee. When borders r closed n families are separated,we need to reaffirm the Human Rights of refugees. pic.twitter.com/LTMnTT9m1L

title: UN Geneva
subtitle: “Solidarity runs deep in the human character. We can not afford to abandon #refugees to hopelessness, not their hosts to bear the responsibility alone.” — @antonioguterres at the Global #RefugeeForumpic.twitter.com/hxGiwvmuQE

title: UN Geneva
subtitle:
“Now more than ever, we need International cooperation and practical, effective responses. The Global Compact on Refugees gives us the blueprint.” — @antonioguterres
#RefugeeForumpic.twitter.com/A9r9ZWzseg

title: Charlotte Slente
subtitle:
The Global #RefugeeForum is an opportunity to go from words to action for refugees and host communities worldwide.

Along with this team, I am here working for responsibility sharing, long-term solutions, protection and other means to a dignified life for all displaced. pic.twitter.com/UZZxzA2yDc
